package org.springframework.data.solr.repository.query;

/**
 * Used to provide additional information on parameters used in query definition. This allows to access per parameter
 * metadata such as Boost values.
 *
 * @author Christoph Strobl
 */
<fim_suffix>public class BindableSolrParameter {

	private final int index;
	private final Object value;
	private float boost;

	public BindableSolrParameter(int index, Object value) {
		super();
		this.index = index;
		this.value = value;
	}

	public float getBoost() {
		return boost;
	}

	public void setBoost(float boost) {
		this.boost = boost;
	}

	public int getIndex() {
		return index;
	}

	public Object getValue() {
		return value;
	}

}<fim_middle>// class below is data class
